Meet the Ipsums

A website to collect and display all the wonderful filler text generators in the world.

Meet The Ipsums was built over a week or so, with the designs and direction coming from good friend, and awesome designer Claudio Guglieri.

I’ve always been a collector, this website showcases filler text. It turns out there’s alot of them… Cat ipsum, coffee ipsum, Ryan Gosling ipsum… the list goes on!

Its always a fun time building things with friends, but then also opening up the website for submissions via GitHub.

➶ Meet the Ipsums
➶ Meet the Ipsums source on GitHub
